name: Dark Sigil
description: Enables Hollowing

name: Lift Chamber Key

description: Opens the cell to Greirat of the Undead Setlement, at the bottom of "The tower on the wall" bonfire.

description: Used to break the seal which keeps players from passing the bridge which leads to Irithyll of the Boreal Valley.

description: Unlocks Soul Spear, Homing Soulmass

description: Used to marry Anri of Astora, and thereby unlocking a different ending.

type.description: Key Items in Dark Souls 3 allow players to advance certain questlines, allow access to undiscoverd areas, and diversify the inventories of merchants.

name: Eyes of a Fire Keeper
description: Give to the Fire Keeper to "remove fire from the world". This changes the firelink shrine music, as well as providing 2 more ending options when interacting with the fire keeper summon sign instead of the bonfire at the end of the game.

type.description: Key Items in Dark Souls 3 allow players to advance certain questlines, allow access to undiscoverd areas, and diversify the inventories of merchants.

name: Crystal Scroll
description: Unlocks Homing Crystal Soulmass, Crystal Soul Spear, Crystal Magic Weapon

description: Unlocks door dividing a hallway inside Irithyll Dungeon

name: Jailer's Key Ring
description: Unlocks cell in Irithyll Dungeon holding Karla, as well as 2 more cells in the dungeon containing items.

type.description: Key Items in Dark Souls 3 allow players to advance certain questlines, allow access to undiscoverd areas, and diversify the inventories of merchants.

name: Hawkwood's Swordgrass
description: Allows you to face Hawkwood at the Abyss Watchers bonfire in Farron Keep for a chance to acquire the Twinkling Dragon Head Stone.

type.description: Key Items in Dark Souls 3 allow players to advance certain questlines, allow access to undiscoverd areas, and diversify the inventories of merchants.

name: Contraption Key

name: Small Envoy Banner
description: Place after you clear The Dreg Heap to be transported to The Ringed City (Location)

type.description: Key Items in Dark Souls 3 allow players to advance certain questlines, allow access to undiscoverd areas, and diversify the inventories of merchants.

name: Young Grass Dew
description: Slightly increases absorption and stamina regeneration

type.description: Key Items in Dark Souls 3 allow players to advance certain questlines, allow access to undiscoverd areas, and diversify the inventories of merchants.

name: Blood of the Dark Soul
description: Can be given to Painting Woman if you have completed Ashes of Ariandel for extra dialogue.

type.description: Key Items in Dark Souls 3 allow players to advance certain questlines, allow access to undiscoverd areas, and diversify the inventories of merchants.

name: White Sign Soapstone
description: Using the White Sign Soapstone allows you to place a summon marker down for other players to use to summon you to their world. Up to 2 phantoms can be summoned to assist a host (3 if using Dried Finger).

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Dried Finger
description: Use to allow the summoning of an additional phantom (up to 3 friendly phantoms). However also allows for the summoning of additional invaders and increases the frequency of invasions.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Red Eye Orb
description: Infinite use item used to invade other players. Using it puts you in a queue to invade a player in your area. Is not consumed upon use.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Cracked Red Eye Orb
description: A single use consumable item used to invade other players. Using it puts you in a queue to invade a player in your area.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Ember
description: Ember increases your HP by 30% until death. Also allows for the summoning of phantoms both friendly and enemies and opens up your world for invasions.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Black Separation Crystal
description: Use to return home from a host's world or to return a phantom home that you summoned in yours.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Vertebrae Shackle
description: Mound-Makers covenant rank item.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Way of White Circlet
description: Restore the link to other worlds.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Pale Tongue
description: Rosaria's Fingers covenant rank item.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Forked Pale Tongue
description: Proof of a red orb invader's victory over a blue spirit. Consume to acquire 2 Pale Tongues.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Wolf's Blood Swordgrass
description: Watchdogs of Farron covenant rank item.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Human Dregs
description: Aldrich Faithful covenant rank item.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Proof of a Concord Kept
description: Blades of the Darkmoon covenant rank item.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Proof of Concord Well Kept
description: Proof of a Blade of the Darkmoon summon's victory over an Aldrich Faithful. Use to acquire 2 Proof of a Concord Kepts.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Roster of Knights
description: The Roster of Knights is used to check the contributions of Darkmoon Knights, showing the top 10 contributors in a list to the top, as well as your rank at the bottom.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Sunlight Medal
description: Warrior of Sunlight covenant rank item.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Red Sign Soapstone
description: Use to summon a dark spirit to your world.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Filianore's Spear Ornament
description: Proof of a Church Spear's fulfilment of duty. Used to rank up in the Spears of the Church.

type.description: Multiplayer Items in Dark Souls 3 will be used to interact with other players. Either by writing them messages or by summoning and being summoned.

name: Estus Flask
description: Use to restore some HP.

description: Use to restore some FP.

description: Increases Item Discovery by 100 for 60 seconds.

type.description: Consumables in Dark Souls 3 are used to gain temporary benefits or deal damage.

name: Young White Branch
description: Makes you harder to be spotted. One use only.The Giant Sniper in Undead Settlement will not target you while carrying one of these.

type.description: Consumables in Dark Souls 3 are used to gain temporary benefits or deal damage.

name: Prism Stone
description: Toss to leave a colored light marker on the ground. ORTrade at Crow's Nest (Pickle-Pee) for a Twinkling Titanite.

type.description: Consumables in Dark Souls 3 are used to gain temporary benefits or deal damage.

name: Homeward Bone
description: Returns player to last bonfire or the one in Firelink Shrine

name: Seed of a Giant Tree

type.description: Consumables in Dark Souls 3 are used to gain temporary benefits or deal damage.

description: Summon a row of upwardly thrusting ritual spears.

type.description: Consumables in Dark Souls 3 are used to gain temporary benefits or deal damage.

name: Ritual Spear Fragment
description: Summon a row of upwardly thrusting ritual spears.

type.description: Consumables in Dark Souls 3 are used to gain temporary benefits or deal damage.

name: Darksign
description: Returns you to the last bonfire used at the cost of deleting all of your current souls.

type.description: Tools in Dark Souls 3 are helpful items that can be used indefinitely.

name: Coiled Sword
description: Thrust into the shrine bonfire to restore its power and enable travel between bonfires.

type.description: Tools in Dark Souls 3 are helpful items that can be used indefinitely.

name: Coiled Sword Fragment
description: Return to last bonfire used or to Firelink Shrine.  Can be used repeatedly.

type.description: Tools in Dark Souls 3 are helpful items that can be used indefinitely.

name: Hello Carving
description: When used, leaves an audible sound saying ''Hello.'' Has unlimited uses.

type.description: Tools in Dark Souls 3 are helpful items that can be used indefinitely.

name: Alluring Skull
description: Use to attract certain enemies to the location thrown. Does not deal damage.

description: Throw at enemy to inflict toxin build-up, but also ups your own toxicity.

name: Firebomb
description: Use to create an explosion at the point of impact, dealing fire damage.

Boss Souls and other special souls in Dark Souls 3 are powerful items that can be converted into new Weapons, Magic, or Items via Soul Transposition from Ludleth of Courland. They may also be consumed to gain a large amount of souls.

name: Profaned Coal
description: Enables Dark, Blood and Hollow infusion

type.description: Ore in Dark Souls 3 are items that can be used to improve Weapons and Shields via Upgrades. These are done at the Shrine via the Blacksmith. In contrast to previous Dark Souls games, now Armor isn't upgradable at all.

name: Farron Coal
description: Enables Heavy, Sharp and Poison infusion

type.description: Ore in Dark Souls 3 are items that can be used to improve Weapons and Shields via Upgrades. These are done at the Shrine via the Blacksmith. In contrast to previous Dark Souls games, now Armor isn't upgradable at all.

name: Greirat's Ashes
description: Unlocks Bloodred Moss Clump, Throwing Knife, Rope Firebomb, Bandits Knife, Longsword, Bastard Sword, Mace, Spear, Light Crossbow, Buckler, Elkhorn Round Shield, Round Shield, Kite Shield, Leather Armor, Leather Gloves, Leather Boots, Standard Helm, Hard Leather Armor Set, Chain Helm, Chain Armor, Thief Mask, Fire Arrow and Standard Bolt from the Shrine Handmaid. Also adds 6 Embers.

type.description: Umbral Ashes in Dark Souls 3 are used to unlock more items from Merchants. By giving Merchants different Ashes, they will sell new and different Weapons, Armor and Items. Below is a list of Ashes that can be found in Dark Souls 3.

name: Irina's Ashes
description: Unlocks Heal, Caressing Tears, Homeward, Replenishment, and Saint's Ring at the Shrine Handmaid

type.description: Umbral Ashes in Dark Souls 3 are used to unlock more items from Merchants. By giving Merchants different Ashes, they will sell new and different Weapons, Armor and Items. Below is a list of Ashes that can be found in Dark Souls 3.

name: Yuria's Ashes
description: Unlocks Purging Stone, Poison Throwing Knife, Londor Braille Divine Tome, Dark Hand, Untrue Dark Ring, Untrue White Ring and Ring of Sacrifice at the Shrine Handmaid

type.description: Umbral Ashes in Dark Souls 3 are used to unlock more items from Merchants. By giving Merchants different Ashes, they will sell new and different Weapons, Armor and Items. Below is a list of Ashes that can be found in Dark Souls 3.

name: Mortician's Ashes
description: Unlocks Charcoal Pine Resin, Charcoal Pine Bundle and Grave Key from Shrine Handmaid. Also adds 3 Embers.

name: Orbeck's Ashes
description: Unlocks Great Soul Arrow, Heavy Soul Arrow, Great Heavy Soul Arrow, Soul Greatsword, Farron Flashsword, Magic Weapon, Magic Shield, Spook and Aural Decoy at the Shrine Handmaid. Or you can give his ashes to Yuria to be rewarded with Morion Blade.
